document.full_text: in final arguments to the jury on tuesday, u.s. prosecutors said evidence was clear that a pakistan-born chicago businessman accused of supporting the 2008 attack on mumbai knew he was aiding a plot that ultimately killed 166 people.
document.title: u.s. trial tied to mumbai attacks hears final arguments
lines_and_colors: in final arguments to the jury on tuesday, u.s. prosecutors said evidence was clear that a pakistan-born chicago businessman accused of supporting the 2008 attack on mumbai knew he was aiding a plot that ultimately killed 166 people.
